case.title: Very Hard Spanking (Manhattan)
case.text:
If you dream of a very hard spanking, then I am a man you will want to meet.
Though it may take a meeting or two before we know each other well enough, eventually you will get the extreme spanking you crave. With my hand and perhaps paddle and perhaps other implements. You will know for days after that you have been spanked
When I take you over my knee and your panties come down, you will be under my control completely.
And the next day when you sit down, you will remember where you were and what happened to you.
Promise.
